answerText: Noam Chomsky[10] This American structuralist wrote the 1933 textbook Language. He is known for his work on the Algonquian languages.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | 1 | 8 | Literature | Other | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Name some linguists, for 10 points each. [10] This man revolutionized modern linguistics by developing the idea of generative grammar. His major works include The Minimalist Program and Syntactic Structures.
